name: Earthen Fury
description: Terra channels her strength into the world around her, buffing her allies and debuffing enemies for 10s.Allies gain 5% damage mitigation and protective stones that heal the ally if all 4 are activated as well as a Heal over Time.Enemies receive 5% more damage from all sources and harmful stones that damage the enemy if all 4 are activated.Stones are activated when an ally or enemy receives damage.
stats: Heal Over Time: 5/8/11/14/17 (+2% of your magical power) every 0.5s for 10s
